name: Words Are Birds
description:
Words Are Birds - Poem by FRANCISCO X. ALARCÓN

Interpretation and Game by Jake Lovrin

Voice-Over by Kaitlyn Cagle

This game was developed in about a week for my Game Design 2 midterm. It features a short, fully voiced poem with different points of interaction. Follow around a quetzal bird as he shows you around his beautiful island he calls his home.
